000.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_PatrollingFlamingFist_000

001.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_PatrollingFlamingFist_001

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Both session '000' and session '001' are triggered using the same conditions during the Act 2 epilogue (with Florrick present, setting the quest flags, and then speaking with the Flaming Fist). They only differ in the final identifier (S_SCE_PatrollingFlamingFist_000 vs. S_SCE_PatrollingFlamingFist_001), which indicates that they are likely alternative outcomes or responses. Since triggering one makes the other redundant or inappropriate (the game would execute one of these one-liners), they are mutually exclusive and cannot occur in the same playthrough.

000_0.speaker: Flaming Fist
000_0.text: Safely on to Baldur's Gate. For all of us.

001_0.speaker: Flaming Fist
001_0.text: We need to move. The city's in danger.

001_1.speaker: Flaming Fist
001_1.text: We need to get back to the city before those monsters do. Baldur's Gate is my home - I have to protect it.
